definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: There's something about being extroverted that seems to protect people.
sentences.chinese: 性格外向的人有某種東西似乎在保護他們。

sentences.english: He thoroughly takes the German national charater apart in the essay.
sentences.chinese: 他在這篇文章裏透徹地剖析了德意志民族性格。

sentences.english: Their personality bearing and the nobility of the character compels obedience naturally.
sentences.chinese: 他們的氣質舉止和高尚的性格讓人們自然而然地折服。

sentences.english: I graduated from junior high school star, I lively and cheerful character, witty humor.
sentences.chinese: 偶畢業於紅星初中，偶噠性格活潑開朗，風趣幽母霈。

sentences.english: Families play an important role in moulding children’s character.
sentences.chinese: 家庭在塑造孩子的性格方面起着重要作用。

sentences.english: Even introverts know what loneliness feels like.
sentences.chinese: 就算是性格內向的人，也知道孤獨是什麼滋味。

sentences.english: But the individual differences or character traits do not get a bearing on the topic problem (Daschmann & Kepplinger 1997).
sentences.chinese: 但是個體的差異和個體性格特點並不阻礙主旨。

sentences.english: If, though, this trait is too annoying, end the friendship.
sentences.chinese: 可是如果這種性格太煩人，那就終結友誼。

sentences.english: And character, in the words of Heraclitus, determines fate.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉克利特曾經說過，性格決定命運。

sentences.english: His character was matured by age.
sentences.chinese: 他的性格因年令而成熟。

sentences.english: Everyone has the obligation to ponder well his own specific traits of character.
sentences.chinese: 所有人都有義務考慮自己的性格特徵。

sentences.english: The inside of each house depended on the personality of its owner.
sentences.chinese: 每個房間內怎樣的佈置，這要看各個使用者的性格了。

sentences.english: My disposition is more inflexible, not to be pooh-poohed communicates contact with at following a person.
sentences.chinese: 我的性格比較僵硬，不善於跟人溝通打交道。

sentences.english: Sometime they can be pessimistic which is caused by their dualistic nature.
sentences.chinese: 由於具雙重性格，有時候他們可能會悲觀厭世。

sentences.english: Su Shi's disposition core is sincere.
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾的性格核心是真率。

definition: spacious and well-lit/open and clear/(of character) optimistic/cheerful/carefree
